mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, post_title, post_content, post_background) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{post_background})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post WHERE user_id = #{user_id} order by post_date DESC

SELECT p.*, (select count(*) from post_like where post_id = p.post_id) as post_like, (select count(*) from reply where post_id = p.post_id) as post_reply_ctn FROM post p order by p.post_date DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (user_id, post_id, reply_content) VALUES (#{user_id},#{post_id},#{reply_content})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, (select count(*) from post_like where post_id = p.post_id) as post_like FROM post p WHERE post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_like (user_id, post_id, author_id) VALUES (#{user_id},#{post_id}, #{author_id})
